The grand tryal, or, Poetical exercitations upon the book of Job wherein suitable to each text of that sacred book, a modest explanation, and continuation of the several discourses contained in it, is attempted / by William Clark. Clark, William, advocate.
[8], 368 p.
Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ... Edinburgh : 1685.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. Errata: p. [7]
